name: My Party Is Made of Monsters
name_original: My Party Is Made of Monsters
description:
Plot summary

Tabytha is a human who was born with an ability to talk to monsters. In a world where adventurers usually grind monsters for loot, that gift has made her an outcast, unable to join any party.

One day while training swordplay out in the woods, Tabytha saves Jelatine - a slightly rude slime monster - from greedy adventurers. To reward this heroic act, the slime offers to join her party?! Tabytha's life with a wacky party of monster-adventurers begins!

Characters ###########################
###########################NameTabythaQuote"Is teaming up with monsters really that weird?"
Normal form


######################################################NameJelatineQuote"Are you thirsty? Humans really are helpless. You can drink some of me if you want..."Normal form
Battle form
######################################################NameAuroraQuote"Loot? Being blessed by my presence should be enough of a reward, shouldn't it?"Normal form
Battle form
######################################################NameLord Zaan Xeelthorde Cafiris van BroodQuote"I don't care about the fate of the world. I'm only here for your sake."Normal form
Battle form
######################################################NameGuacoQuote"If you die here, I promise to plant flowers on your body."Normal form
Battle form

Disclaimer: this is a super early version of the game, and I'm just doing it for giggles, so don't expect too much ;)
